alert.note: Alert for Comanche; Cotton; Tillman (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 23 at 2:29PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Comanche, northwestern Cotton, southeastern Tillman, northwestern Wichita and southeastern Wilbarger Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 229 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Loveland Oklahoma to 7 miles northeast of Harrold Texas. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Electra, Geronimo, Grandfield, Chattanooga, Faxon, Hollister, Loveland, Harrold, Grayback and Haynesville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
